name: mini-go
description: A simple URL redirector, intended for shortening.

scripts.build: npm run build-react && tsc && cp -R react-app/build/* static/ && mv static/index.html static/app.html
scripts.dev-react: cd react-app && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 BROWSER=none npm run start

author: Octav "Narc" Sandulescu
